name: Escape The Color Line Switch
description:
—————It’s too typical and difficult as you need to try harder to survive longer—————


“Escape The Color Line Switch?” is one of the best casual game. Here all you need to do is to pass through in between the incoming geometry lines and escape through this hard maze.

Avoid the collision with the lines as well as the geometry colorful circles.

How to play:

• Swipe to move

Cool gameplay for your casual hours!!
